input.sentences: today was one of the most boring days we 've encountered to date .
we found a nearby park we had never visited .
it had a beautiful waterfall | but that was about it .
we continued our venture deeper into the park and found an abandoned railroad track .
it even had broken down cars still on it 's track ! still not very exciting | but we climbed on and in them | ended up being the highlight of our day .
output.sentences: We encountered the dam days after our initially start date for our travels.
We visited the park nearby afterwards.
We decided to venture towards the track, which eventually led to the railroad.
Although the track to the railroad was cool, it was not the highlight of our trip because everything  else was more exciting.
